name: Barnyard Millet (‡≤ä‡≤¶‡≤≤‡≥Å)
description:
Barnyard Millet (Oodalu / Sanwa) ‚Äì Unpolished | Naturally Grown | Gluten-Free Supergrain
From FarmHarvestToHome ‚Äì Nourishing You the Traditional Way

Embrace the power of ancient grains with our premium-quality Barnyard Millet, known as Oodalu in Kannada and Sanwa in North India. Grown using sustainable, traditional farming practices, our Barnyard Millet is chemical-free, unpolished, sun-dried, and handled with care ‚Äî right from seed to sack ‚Äî so you get a grain that‚Äôs as natural as the soil it comes from.

This lesser-known but highly nutritious millet is a perfect addition to modern diets. With its high fiber content, low glycemic index, and rich mineral profile, Barnyard Millet is a superfood that helps you stay full, energized, and healthy throughout the day.

üçö How to Use Oodalu in Your Kitchen:
Oodalu cooks quickly and easily ‚Äî just like rice! Use it to make upma, pongal, khichdi, pulao, or even sweet dishes like payasam (kheer). It also makes a great base for gluten-free porridge, rotis, or snacks like millet tikki and cheela.

Quick Tip: Soak the millet for 30 minutes before cooking for a softer texture and better nutrient absorption.
